mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveDepartmentInformationList */ A.DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , A.DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , A.DEPT_DESC AS "departmentDesc" , A.STCD AS "statusCode" , A.FRST_REG_DT AS "firstRegisterDate" , A.LAST_CHNG_DT AS "lastChangeDate" , B.TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , B.DEPT_ROLE_CD AS "departmentRoleCode" , C.DEPT_ROLE_NM AS "departmentRoleName" , C.DEPT_ROLE_DESC AS "departmentRoleDesc" , D.FRST_NM AS "firstName" , D.LAST_NM AS "lastName" , D.NICK_NM AS "nickName" FROM FRST.DEPT_INFO A LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_MNGT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.DEPT_ROLE_CD = '101' --Manager AND B.STCD <> '09' LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_ROLE_MNGT C ON B.DEPT_ROLE_CD = C.DEPT_ROLE_CD AND C.STCD <> '09' LEFT JOIN FRST.TCH_DETAIL D ON B.TCH_ID = D.TCH_ID AND D.STCD <> '09' WHERE A.DEPT_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{departmentName}, '') || '%' ORDER BY A.DEPT_ID ASC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT /* RetrieveDepartmentInformationTotalCount */ COUNT(*) AS "totalCount" FROM FRST.DEPT_INFO A LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_MNGT B ON A.DEPT_ID = B.DEPT_ID AND B.DEPT_ROLE_CD = '101' --Manager AND B.STCD <> '09' LEFT JOIN FRST.DEPT_ROLE_MNGT C ON B.DEPT_ROLE_CD = C.DEPT_ROLE_CD AND C.STCD <> '09' LEFT JOIN FRST.TCH_DETAIL D ON B.TCH_ID = D.TCH_ID AND D.STCD <> '09' WHERE A.DEPT_NM ILIKE '%' || COALESCE(#{departmentName},'') || '%'

SELECT /* RetrieveDepartmentInformationDetail */ DEPT_ID AS "departmentID" , DEPT_NM AS "departmentName" , DEPT_DESC AS "departmentDesc" , STCD AS "statusCode" FROM FRST.DEPT_INFO WHERE DEPT_ID = #{departmentID} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterDepartmentInformation */ INTO FRST.DEPT_INFO ( DEPT_ID , DEPT_NM , DEPT_DESC , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{departmentID} , COALESCE(#{departmentName}, '') , COALESCE(#{departmentDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateDepartmentInformation */ FRST.DEPT_INFO SET DEPT_NM = COALESCE(#{departmentName}, DEPT_NM) , DEPT_DESC = COALESCE(#{departmentDesc}, DEPT_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE DEPT_ID = #{departmentID}
